TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Scope extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示令牌颁发请求的配置。

span.span: Represents the configuration for the token issuance request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类封装有关与安全令牌请求 (RST) 关联的信赖方 (RP) 的信息。The class encapsulates information about the relying party (RP) associated with a security token request (RST). 此信息由的实现令牌颁发管道返回响应 (RSTR) 对安全令牌请求 (RST) 中的类 (STS)。This information is used by implementations of the class (STS) in the token issuance pipeline to return a response (RSTR) to a security token request (RST). 对象包含地址的相关信息的 RP、 加密和签名凭据要用于颁发的安全令牌中，并使用颁发的令牌本身或对称密钥是否应加密令牌。 objects contain information about the address of the RP, the encrypting and signing credentials to be used with the issued security token, and whether the token itself or symmetric keys issued with the token should be encrypted. 默认情况下，令牌和对称密钥进行加密。By default, both the token and symmetric keys are encrypted. 你可以扩展类来执行请求，如由 RP，接受的令牌类型有关的其他信息默认令牌生存期、 最大令牌生存期、 由 RP，使用的算法套件和依此类推; 但是，信息将封装在此类不应因各个请求而不同。You can extend the class to carry additional information about the request, such as token types accepted by the RP, default token lifetime, maximum token lifetime, algorithm suites used by the RP, and so on; however, the information encapsulated in this class should not vary for individual requests. 在中实现令牌颁发管道时，因此该方法将调用方法以获取 RST 的配置。The token issuance pipeline is implemented in the method and this method invokes the method to get the configuration for the RST. 必须实现方法在你自定义 STS 和返回适用于 RP 和 STS 实现的对象。You must implement a method in your custom STS and return a object appropriate for the RP and your STS implementation.

public: virtual property System::IdentityModel::Tokens::EncryptingCredentials ^ EncryptingCredentials { System::IdentityModel::Tokens::EncryptingCredentials ^ get(); void set(System::IdentityModel::Tokens::EncryptingCredentials ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置依赖方的加密凭据。

span.span: Gets or sets the encrypting credentials for the relying party.

value.span: 被用于依赖的一方的加密凭据。

span.span: The encrypting credentials to be used for the relying party.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果属性是`true`，凭据用于加密颁发的安全令牌。If the property is `true`, the credentials are used to encrypt issued security tokens. 如果属性是`true`，凭据用于加密颁发与安全令牌的对称密钥。If the property is `true`, the credentials are used to encrypt symmetric keys issued with security tokens.

value.span: 如果必须加密对称密钥，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if symmetric keys must be encrypted; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果属性是`true`，对称密钥加密的使用中的凭据属性。If the property is `true`, symmetric keys are encrypted using the credentials in the property.

summary.span: 获取或设置指示颁发的安全令牌是否必须加密的值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether issued security tokens must be encrypted.

value.span: 如果必须加密安全标记，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if security tokens must be encrypted; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果属性是`true`，安全令牌使用中的凭据进行加密属性。If the property is `true`, security tokens are encrypted using the credentials in the property.
